welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Boulder City! This charming city is known for its stunning desert landscape, outdoor adventures, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Boulder City has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boulder City Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boulder City Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Air Terminal
